sentences.en: a house and stables, with a yard in between
sentences.cn: 中间隔着院子的房子和马廐

sentences.en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentences.cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

sentences.en: has written several books and teaches in between times.
sentences.cn: 在写书的同时也教书

sentences.en: He complained a little of a nagging pain between his shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 他有几句提到说肩胛骨之间一直在疼。

sentences.en: He ignores the traditional Christian dualism between body and soul.
sentences.cn: 他无视传统基督教的肉体与灵魂的二元论。

sentences.en: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.cn: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I sat down between Jo and Diana.
sentences.cn: 我在乔和黛安娜中间坐下。

sentences.en: I sat down between Sue and Jane.
sentences.cn: 我在苏和简中间坐了下来。

sentences.en: I see her most weekends but not very often in between.
sentences.cn: 我周末大多都能见到她，但平时不常见到。

sentences.en: just between you and me, I don't think it was going to happen.
sentences.cn: 只是咱们私下说说，我认为这事不会发生的。

sentences.en: Mother interposed in the dispute between my brother and me.
sentences.cn: 母亲干预了我和哥哥之间的争论。

sentences.en: My roommates disagreed and I was caught in between.
sentences.cn: 我的室友不同意，我被夹在中间进退两难

sentences.en: Q comes between P and R in the English alphabet.
sentences.cn: 英语字母表中，Q在P和R之间。

sentences.en: Robb is torn between becoming a doctor and a career in athletics.
sentences.cn: 罗布在做医生还是当运动员之间痛苦抉择，左右为难。

sentences.en: The ball rolled between his feet.
sentences.cn: 球在他两脚之间滚来滚去。

sentences.en: The boundaries between history and storytelling are always being blurred and muddled.
sentences.cn: 历史和轶闻的分界向来是模糊而混乱的。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The formalization of co-operation between the republics would produce progress.
sentences.cn: 正式确立合作关系将会促进共和国之间合作的顺利进展。

sentences.en: The house was near a park but there was a road in between.
sentences.cn: 房子在一处公园附近，但两者之间隔着一条马路。

sentences.en: The minister denied there was a direct connection between the two issues.
sentences.cn: 部长否认两者之间有直接的联系。

sentences.en: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.cn: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: There is a credibility gap developing between employers and employees.
sentences.cn: 雇主和雇员之间出现了信任危机。

sentences.en: There is room for infill between the new outer suburbs.
sentences.cn: 在新建的远郊住宅区之间还有空地可以盖房。

sentences.en: There will be a run-off between these two candidates on December 9th.
sentences.cn: 12月9日将举行这两位候选人的决胜选举。

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 只限于咱们之间；秘密的
你知我知，天知地知：表示非常信任
穿插着；同时：在其间的一段时期；同时

trans.tran_en: in the space or period of time separating two or more points, objects, etc. or two dates, events, etc.
in or through the place that seprates two things, people, or places

trans.tran_cn: 在…之间，介于…之间，往返于，共享，一起
trans.tran_en: in or into the space separating two or more points, objects, people, etc.
